description: This API allows users to download the shipping document associated with a specific job ID. It checks the job status before proceeding with the download.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple call and expires at 4 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Seller's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: Generated Job ID for status tracking and download the Shipping Document
